t:type.name: ActionSelector
t:type.t:description: Represents an input type for an action

t:attribute.name: type
t:attribute.values: BOOLEAN, LIST, GROUP, DURATION, RANGE, PERCENT, THERMOSTAT, TEMPERATURE
t:attribute.description: The type of selector, this guides the type of value.

t:attribute.name: name
t:attribute.description: The name of the selector to display to the user.

t:attribute.name: value
t:attribute.description: The available values to show, mapped as follows: BOOLEAN - Not set LIST - List<Tuple<String,String>>, a list of [ value, label ] tuples. GROUP - List<Tuple<String,List<ActionSelector>>, a list of label and selector tuples. The selectors associated with each grouping are the additional or sub-selectors that should be used when the target is added to that group. For example a dimmer would have a PERCENT selector in the ON group, but no selectors in the OFF group. RANGE - Not set PERCENT - Not set THERMOSTAT - Not set TEMPERATURE - A numeric value

t:attribute.name: unit
t:attribute.description: Currently used by the DURATION, RANGE and TEMPERATURE selectors to specify SEC, MIN, HOUR, C or F

t:attribute.name: min
t:attribute.description: The minimum value that can be set, only applicable to DURATION, RANGE, TEMPERATURE and PERCENT selectors right now.

t:attribute.name: max
t:attribute.description: The maximum value that can be set, only applicable to DURATION, RANGE, TEMPERATURE and PERCENT selectors right now.

t:attribute.name: step
t:attribute.description: A recommended delta between values when generating a range.
